price: 62. Yuu idinka leexin shaydaanka (Jidka), hubaal wuxuu idiin yahay cadow iska cad.
arabic: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā yaṣuddannakumu al-shayṭānu innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
